content: // Repository.readCSV() has argument 'path' with default value https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Kotlin/dataframe/master/data/jetbrains_repositories.csv val df = Repository.readCSV() // Use generated properties to access data in rows df.maxBy { stargazers_count }.print() // Or to access columns in dataframe. print(df.full_name.count { it.contains("kotlin") })
